mapper.select: select * from STAFF s join COUNSEL_BOOKING cb ON cb.STAFF_NO = s.STAFF_NO join code c on cb.booking_time = c.cd where cate = '5000' and cb.student_No = #{student_No} ORDER BY booking_no DESC LIMIT #{start}, 10
select count(*) from STAFF s join COUNSEL_BOOKING cb ON cb.STAFF_NO = s.STAFF_NO join code c on cb.booking_time = c.cd where cate = '5000'
